Question: Shenzhen Kixin Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Kixin Electronics Co., Ltd

X11 Long Battery E-Scooter

- Lithium battery with detachable and replaceable design
- Endurance with 55km max range
- 3-second folding design
- Lightweight at 16kg
- LED display for speed preview
- Push-type throttle for free speed control
- 350W brushless high-performance motor
- 8.5/10-inch anti-skid, anti-vibration tires
- Triple brake system with disc brake and E-ABS anti-lock system

X11 长续航电动滑板车

- 锂电池可拆卸和可替换设计
- 最大续航里程为55公里
- 3秒折叠设计

- LED显示屏显示速度预览
- 推杆式油门，可自由控制速度
- 350瓦无刷高性能电机
- 8.5 / 10英寸防滑、防震轮胎
